summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sales Booster 'Boost Digitally' module - Backend APIs fully functional (100% success), Public funnel page working perfectly, Frontend authentication issues preventing dashboard access

ui_bugs.issue: Browser redirects from dashboard pages back to homepage despite successful backend authentication
Login modal closes after submission but doesn't establish client-side authenticated session

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not properly recognizing authenticated state despite valid backend session cookies

passed_tests: Backend: Login API (POST /api/login) - Working with proper cookie setting
Backend: DM template CRUD (POST, GET, DELETE /api/digital-lab/templates)
Backend: Follow-up reminders CRUD (POST, GET, PATCH /api/digital-lab/reminders)
Backend: Public funnel page access (GET /api/funnel/[slug]) - No auth required
Backend: Public funnel lead submission (POST /api/funnel/[slug]) - No auth required
Frontend: Public funnel page loads correctly with proper headline and form fields
Frontend: Public funnel form submission works with thank you page display
Frontend: Funnel page displays custom headline 'Join My Network Marketing Team'
Frontend: Funnel form captures name, phone, email with proper validation
Frontend: Thank you message displays correctly after form submission
Server-side: Dashboard pages render correctly when accessed with valid cookies

success_percentage.backend: 100% (43/43 API tests passed including all new Digital Lab endpoints)
success_percentage.frontend: 50% (Public funnel working perfectly, Dashboard authentication failing)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend client-side authentication state management. Backend authentication is fully functional but frontend redirects users from dashboard pages to homepage. Issues: 1) Login modal doesn't establish client-side authenticated session 2) Frontend authentication state not syncing with backend session cookies 3) Dashboard routes inaccessible due to client-side auth checks failing. All Digital Lab backend functionality is working perfectly and ready for use once frontend auth is fixed.
